patthana24.12:1.1_0: Noāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.12:2.1_0: Nanoāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana24.12:3.1_0: Noāsavaṁ nahetuñca nanoāsavaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana24.12:4.1_0: Noāsavaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana24.12:5.1_0: Nanoāsavaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.12:6.1_0: Noāsavaṁ nanahetuñca nanoāsavaṁ nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
